titleStmt.title: Political aphorisms, or, The true maxims of government displayed wherein is likewise proved ... : by way of a challenge to Dr. William Sherlock and ten other new dissenters, and recommended as proper to be read by all Protestant Jacobites.
titleStmt.author: Harrison, Thomas, fl. 1690.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Harrison by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Item at reel 1189:4 identified as H140 (number cancelled).
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library and University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
